name: LinkBuildArtifacts
description: Creates hardlinks and junctions to fileshare build artifacts that are on the same machine
author: Ahmed Makhdoom

inputs.name: destinationDir
inputs.label: Destination path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Destination directory to create links in, e.g. `$(System.ArtifactsDirectory)`

inputs.name: artifactNameRegex
inputs.label: Artifact name pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression to filter artifacts by their name, e.g. `(artifact1|artifact2)`. The expression is case-inensitive

inputs.name: cleanDestinationDir
inputs.label: Clean
inputs.helpMarkDown: Empty out the destination directory before creating links
